content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":57421,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/adf8a68f-3145-4c2f-aaaa-1b31c0e9655c/1.svg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/adf8a68f-3145-4c2f-aaaa-1b31c0e9655c/1.svg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"1.svg\",\"name\":\"1.svg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"svg+xml\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"adf8a68f-3145-4c2f-aaaa-1b31c0e9655c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":652,\"height\":316},\"extension\":\"svg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee compensation at EPAM is managed through the Compensation Portal. Once you’re given the responsibility to work with employees’ compensation, you will be assigned a very comprehensive “Compensation Management” training that will guide you through the compensation strategy and processes, as well as it will provide you with a very comprehensive tool user guide. Please be sure to complete that training in its entirety, and to raise any questions to your RM or People Partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":24065,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cd27fa5d-7505-482e-aa7f-5aea356876a3/Compensation.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cd27fa5d-7505-482e-aa7f-5aea356876a3/Compensation.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Compensation.png\",\"name\":\"Compensation.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cd27fa5d-7505-482e-aa7f-5aea356876a3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":153,\"height\":153},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you do not have a Compensation role, it is still important that you listen to any concerns your reports raise to you about compensation, and that you discuss them promptly with your Resource Manager. Even those with a Compensation role will frequently need to discuss concerns with their manager, as decisions related to compensation and any changes require upper management approvals. Your People Partner can also provide advice and guidance.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Remember, whether you are directly involved in directly setting compensation or not, it is important to always listen to your people regarding any of their concerns, and to not make any promises or commitments until you have reviewed them with your leadership (who have the decision-making authority).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
